alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Otero, northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Higbee, or 17 miles south of North La Junta, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Higbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County
